messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Whispering Woods Whodunit DATE: 06/06/61 The courtroom was charged with a blend of expectation and suspense as the trial unfolded. The prosecution summoned the officers key to the investigation to share their accounts. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Adams, the chief investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Lieutenant Adams. Can you elucidate on the events on the night the incident was uncovered? WITNESS: Certainly. On the night of December 12th, Officer C. D. Brown observed suspicious individuals in Whispering Woods and reported it. We launched the investigation immediately. PROSECUTOR: Who handled the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Clark and Technician G. H. Davis were assigned to the forensic examination. PROSECUTOR: Who oversaw the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Evans and K. L. Foster were in charge of interrogating the suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense began a cross-examination of Lieutenant Adams regarding the investigative methods adopted. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Green, O. P. Hill, and Q. R. Isaac were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
